required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: CD19 Targeted UCAR-T for CD19+ Refractory/Relapsed B-ALL/NHL
clinical_study.official_title: Anti-CD19 Universal CAR-T Cells for CD19+ Refractory/Relapsed B Cell Acute Lymphoblastic Leukemia and Refractory/Relapsed B Cell Non-hodgkin's Lymphoma

lead_sponsor.agency: 920th Hospital of Joint Logistics Support Force of People's Liberation Army of China

clinical_study.source: 920th Hospital of Joint Logistics Support Force of People's Liberation Army of China

brief_summary.textblock: This is a single arm, open-label, multi-center prospective study to determine the safety and efficacy of CD19 UCAR-T cells in patients diagnosed with CD19+ refractory/relapsed B cell acute lymphoblastic leukemia and B cell non-Hodgkin lymphoma.

primary_outcome.time_frame: Up to 4 weeks after CAR-T infusion
primary_outcome.description: CRS lasting ≥7 days G3 or ≥G4 after CAR-T infusion

primary_outcome.measure: Incidence of AE after CAR-T infusion
primary_outcome.time_frame: B-ALL up to 12 weeks and B-NHL up to 24 weeks after CAR-T infusion
primary_outcome.description: Incidence of adverse events after CAR-T infusion

secondary_outcome.time_frame: 4 weeks，12 weeks, 24 weeks after CAR-T infusion
secondary_outcome.description: Overall response rate after CAR-T infusion

secondary_outcome.time_frame: 4 weeks，12 weeks, 24 weeks after CAR-T infusion
secondary_outcome.description: Progression free survival after CAR-T infusion

secondary_outcome.time_frame: 4 weeks，12 weeks, 24 weeks after CAR-T infusion
B-ALL up to 12 weeks and B-NHL up to 24 weeks after CAR-T infusion
secondary_outcome.description: CAR Copies measured by qPCR after CAR-T infusion

secondary_outcome.time_frame: B-ALL up to 12 weeks and B-NHL up to 24 weeks after CAR-T infusio
secondary_outcome.description: CAR-T cell counts measured by Flow cytometry after CAR-T infusion

secondary_outcome.measure: Changes in the concentration of cytokine
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Up to 4 weeks after CAR-T infusion
secondary_outcome.description: Cytokines in serum measured by ELISA after CAR-T infusion

clinical_study.condition: B-cell Acute Lymphoblastic Leukemia and B-cell Lymphoma

arm_group.description: Anti-CD19 UCAR-T is an allogeneic CAR-T. A single infusion.

intervention.description: After preconditioning with chemotherapy ( Flu+ Cy), the dosage of anti-CD19 UCAR-T cells between 0.5 and 2 ×10^7 cells/Kg will be evaluated.

facility.name: 920th Hospital of Joint Logistics Support Force of People's Liberation Army of China

responsible_party.investigator_affiliation: 920th Hospital of Joint Logistics Support Force of People's Liberation Army of China
